messages.subject: more nagamaki pictures
messages.msgSnippet: All, I put up a photo of the parrying bars and a drawing of the koshirae of the nerikawa-guard nagamaki we were discussing at: http://tinyurl.com/dvc8 Note
messages.messageBody:
All,
I put up a photo of the parrying bars and a drawing of the koshirae of the nerikawa-guard nagamaki we were discussing at:

http://tinyurl.com/dvc8

Note that the parrying bars have slight notches or barbs on them, perhaps to catch or even break an opponent's blade.

Jim

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
